name: I Know a Tale
description: Do not open the collector's safe!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8 Processor: 1.2 GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Storage: 470 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Really its a very good game  i play it for 6 hours without boring  and its very cheab  its worth mora than its price  (the story real take about 2 to 3 hours) i played it two times

Although it's true that the plot isn't very original and the acting isn't amazing, this is still a pretty good HOG. This is because the puzzles are good, it's fairly logical to follow and the live action cut scenes add a little flavour to what is otherwise pretty standard. What I did love about this game in particular is the bad translation. This clearly wasn't written originally in English and I just love the charming mistakes in all the tips.
